ResourceHeader.ResourceName: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar (Raw Ne)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains EISCAT common program CP1 raw electron density from the Tromso UHF Radar.

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Antenna Azimuth
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Azimuth (0, North)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Antenna Elevation
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Elevation (90, Vertical)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Half Scattering Angle
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Half Scattering Angle (0, 90째)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Transmit Peak Power
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Transmit Peak Power

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Number of Sample Summed
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Number of Sample Summed - Increment
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed - Increment

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar System Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Single Value Parameters - Values: System Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP1 Tromso UHF Radar Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats: The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. Scale : 1.e^-3
